title: Low Complexity Detector for XL-MIMO Uplink: A Cross Splitting Based Information Geometry Approach
authors: Wenjun Zhang, An-An Lu, Xiqi Gao
summary: This paper proposes a novel detector approach called CS-IGA for uplink signal recovery in XL-MIMO systems, reducing computational complexity by factorizing the natural parameter in the a posteriori distribution.
key_points: Seamless integration of discrete constellation constraints
Achieves comparable BER performance to Bayes optimal AMP and IGA with lower cost
Establishes CS-IGA as a practical solution for high-throughput signal detection in next generation XL-MIMO systems
